ModMetaData.name: [1001]Weapons Tab Reborn
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
I picked this one up, and I intend to update it further. I intend to add compatibility with Simple Sidearms.
Original: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2288470754
Original description ## Weapons Tab - Adds a 'Weapons' tab to the bottom bar that lets you view what weapons each colonist has equipped - Lets you create weapon loadouts and assign each colonist a loadout - Colonists will automatically pick up weapons that are allowed in their current loadout (and drop thier weapon if it is not allowed) - If a colonist sees that a better quality of the same weapon is available, they will swap out for the better one
## Fun fact - I made this mod because I was playing in a game with 100 colonists and was tired of manually assigning a weapon to each one
## Requires - The Harmony workshop item is required for this mod to work: steam://url/CommunityFilePage/2009463077
## Incompatibilities - Currently incompatible with Multiplayer, hope to fix that soon /Original description
